document_title: Cataracts (dry cataracts): Causes, signs and treatments
subsection_content:
Based on the stages of the disease, patients will be advised on measures to improve vision and treat cataracts appropriately. (4)
1. Use support glasses
In the early stages, when vision has not yet deteriorated much, doctors often let patients wear glasses or use magnifying glasses to help provide essential nutrients to the eyes. Patients should work in a well-lit environment to minimize visual disturbances.
2. Surgery
In cases where the patient cannot use medication or wear glasses, artificial lens replacement surgery is needed. Phaco surgery is one of the safe and effective methods in improving vision for people with the disease.
Modern scientific techniques have brought successful artificial glass replacement surgeries to patients
